Name: Endless Winter
About the game: V1.0.0.0 RELEASED!!!Challenge Mode and FREE DLC ：Map Editor!!!!!!!!!!!! Endless Winter is a slightly difficult clearance game. Players control the cars passing through varied terrains and mechanisms, and breaking through the obstacles setting up by robots. Our story happens in a cold future world which experienced the war between humans and artificial intelligence. You can explore the wasteland as a courier. You also can challenge all kinds of difficulties with your friends. Features Story Mode: Experience a unique story of a courier in the end of the winter world. You can learn this world and gameplay through Story Mode, then became an “Old Driver” who will never be stumped by this snow world. Challenge Mode: You need to challenge a large map with multiple checkpoints. Along the way, the fox store has prepared various supplies for you. You can purchase them by collecting the badge of snow fox. After passing the map, you can upload your time record to see the global ranking list. Map Editor：You can create your own challenge mode map and share it with other players through steam workshop. And you can download other player's challenge mode map for play. Multiplayer Mode：After experiencing Story Mode, you can challenge our varied featured levels with your friends! Multi-difficulties：There is difficulty distinction, and challenge play in Multiplayer Mode. Players can challenge according to their preferences. Multiplayer Mode supports games that up to five players simultaneous online or offline. In Multiplayer Mode, many car skill options can be chosen. Players can compete with others or help others. Original Music: Thanks to ALEXU Media Studio!
